testcase.name: Verify product selection, cart functionality, and total amount in General Store App

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given I open the General Store app on an android device.....................undefined When I select "Egypt" from the country dropdown.............................undefined And I enter my name as "Hesham Abd Elhamed" in the text field...............undefined And I select "Male" as my gender............................................undefined And I click on the Letâ€™s Shop button........................................undefined Then I add the first product to the cart....................................undefined And I add the second product to the cart....................................undefined When I navigate to the cart screen..........................................undefined Then I verify that the selected products are displayed in the cart..........undefined And I assert that the total amount equals the sum of the two products' values.undefined Then i close the android app................................................undefined
